channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Web Directory Free
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Web Directory Free

item.title: CVE-2024-3552|2024-06-13T06:00:02.709Z -- unknown -- web%20directory%20free
item.description: The Web Directory Free WordPress plugin before 1.7.0 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement via an AJAX action available to unauthenticated users, leading to a SQL injection with different techniques like UNION, Time-Based and Error-Based.
